<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Expand PseudoCALL(Reg), PseudoTAIL and PseudoJump to AUIPC and JALR with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// relocation types. We expand those pseudo-instructions while encoding them,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// meaning AUIPC and JALR won&#39;t go through RISC-V MC to MC compressed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction transformation. This is acceptable because AUIPC has no 16-bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// form and C&#95;JALR has no immediate operand field.  We let linker relaxation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// deal with it. When linker relaxation is enabled, AUIPC and JALR have a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// chance to relax to JAL.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the C extension is enabled, JAL has a chance relax to C&#95;JAL.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-riscvmccodeemitter-cpp-/riscvmccodeemitter/#abb7cbfc91aec970d7d9b935b81f8db66"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-riscvmccodeemitter-cpp-/riscvmccodeemitter/#abb7cbfc91aec970d7d9b935b81f8db66">RISCVMCCodeEmitter::expandFunctionCall</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;char&gt;</a> &amp;CB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;MCFixup&gt;</a> &amp;Fixups,</span></CodeLine>
